name: update
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to make something more modern or suitable for use now by adding new information or changing its design

example.eg: an updated version of the software

trans_examp.trans_en: to give someone the most recent information

example.eg: We'll update you on this news story throughout the day.
example.egtrans: 我们将全天向您报道该新闻事件的最新进展。

name: update
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an act of updating something or someone with new information

example.eg: Jo's just doing an update on the mailing list.
I'll need regular updates on your progress.
example.egtrans: 我要定期了解你的最新进展。

trans_examp.trans_en: a new form of something that existed at an earlier time

example.eg: It's an update of an old 60s movie.
example.egtrans: 它翻拍自一部60年代的老电影。
